attributes.action: A vote of NO confidence in all our political parties.
attributes.background: For too long we, the people , have been lied to by corrupt politicians lining their own , and others, pockets.  Giving our money away in foreign aid where it's not needed and not going to the people who genuinely need help. A full investigation into the accounts of every MP over the past 30 years.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. 

The expression "vote of no confidence" is used when talking about a vote in the House of Commons which tests whether or not the Government of the day has the confidence of a majority of MPs in the House of Commons. That's why we allow petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in the Government or in individual Ministers. But the same wouldn't apply to all political parties.

If you are concerned about foreign aid, you might like to sign one of the petitions already open on the site on this subject.
